extendedInfo.description: Got Questions? Ask Bullhorn and people nearby will answer!   1. Use Bullhorn for work! "Where's the best place to take my client for lunch today in Centre Square?" "Can anyone nearby help clean out our storage room? $100 wage for project." "We need extras in Patterson Park for a 3pm commercial shoot. Compensation is $50" 2. Use Bullhorn for play! "Anyone in Central Park up for softball?" "Where's the best Tuesday happy hour special in Canton Square?" "What's the best running route in Adams Morgan? 3. Use Bullhorn for emergencies! "My car battery is dead! Can someone nearby please bring me jumper cables?" "Baking a cake and don't have an egg.  Can someone on S. Lakewood Ave help?" "I'm late for my 10am interview and can't find parking on Boston St.  Any suggestions on where to park for free?" Bullhorn makes asking and answering questions on Android easy and fun. Bullhorn is a mobile application that simplifies how we get and share information on the go. Hereâs how it works: If you have a question, ask Bullhorn and the app will notify people nearby to answer.  Just imagine you have a giant megaphone (a bullhorn) and you yell out your question. People nearby use their "megaphone" to yell back answers. Bullhorn is also great for finding out information about areas to which you are traveling. For example, you can ask your question, drag the map to the location of your question, and Bullhorn finds local people to answer you. Itâs great if youâre headed across town and have questions about traffic, parking, food specials, crowds and much more. Use your Bullhorn and shout out your question today!

reviews.title: Yes!!
reviews.comment: Great idea, can\'t wait for it to grow so more people can answer my questions :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Novel Concept
reviews.comment: Novel concept but inadequate participation. No one was ever near me & even still no one ever answered any questions. Also it is a resource hog for such a basic app. Half the time it wouldn\'t upload my questions it would just freeze up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Useful
reviews.comment: A must have.  Used it when visiting DC and local people nearby helped me find my way around!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Great concept app works well, just needs more people to download it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Any from utah get this app needs more people
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Yo....
reviews.comment: Dis is bs!!! I cant ask no questions or answer none...total garbage!!! Uninstall before u install....
reviews.author: melvin friendly

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Java errors, restart required. Never starts.
reviews.author: A Google User
